alert.note: Alert for Coastal Wakulla; Inland Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 3:40PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Wakulla County through 430 PM EDT... At 340 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles west of Crawfordville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Crawfordville and Arran. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
